Staker.getUserUnlockTime(address) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xa1846d48a175eaeea7891557c88c01451b447ada-Staker.sol#381-392) uses a weak PRNG: senderLock < minimalWaitTime (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xa1846d48a175eaeea7891557c88c01451b447ada-Staker.sol#387)
